discription.Key_Features: Powered By AI : A neural network-based algorithm detects fabric type and weight. It then optimises the wash—duration, water level, wash    actions and the level of gentleness needed.
discription.Additional_Features: Active Mix : Premixes water and detergent for better and faster detergent action.
discription.Wash Programs: Aqua Energie : IFB's patented Aqua Energie treats hard water and improves detergent action to protect color and prevent fading.

discription.Key_Features: Powered By AI : A neural network-based algorithm detects fabric type and weight. It then optimises the wash—duration, water level, wash actions and the level of gentleness needed.
discription.Additional_Features: Power Steam® : 99.99% germ-free clothes with a Dual Steam Cycle and Hot Wash up to 60˚C. Get the highest level of hygiene for your laundry.
discription.Wash Programs: Hot Wash At 60°C : State-of-the-art heater technology tested to last at least 10 years. Scale proof, rust proof and even saves you energy while giving you 99.99% germ free washing!

discription.Key_Features: Lint Tower Filter : Traps lint and loose microfibres during washing, which otherwise are drained, affecting the environment. Easily removed for cleaning.
discription.Additional_Features: Aqua Energie : IFB's patented Aqua Energie treats hard water and improves detergent action to protect color and prevent fading.
discription.Wash Programs: Smart Sense : An inbuilt smart sensing mechanism automatically weighs the load and adjusts settings accordingly to save water and detergent.
